systemPipeShiny 0.99.0
  • Get started

Remove a SPS tab

Source: R/spsNewtab.R
removeSpsTab.Rd

remove a tab R file and remove from the tabs.csv config file

removeSpsTab(
  tab_id = "none",
  force = FALSE,
  app_path = getwd(),
  multiple = FALSE,
  verbose = spsOption("verbose"),
  colorful = spsOption("use_crayon")
)

Arguments

tab_id

tab ID, string, length 1, supports regular expressions, so be careful. If more than one tabs are matched, stop by default
force

bool, whether to ask for confirmation
app_path

app directory
multiple

bool, if matched more than one tab, trun this to TRUE can remove more than one tab at a time. Be careful.
verbose

bool, follows project setting, but can be overwrite. TRUE will give you more information
colorful

bool, whether the message will be colorful or not

Value

remove the tab file and register info in tabs.csv

Examples

spsInit(change_wd = FALSE, overwrite = TRUE)
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Start to create a new SPS project
#> Warning: 
[SPS-WARNING] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Overwrite things in /home/dcassol/danielac@ucr.edu/testing/systemPipeShiny/docs/reference/SPS_20200810
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Now copy files
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Create SPS database
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Created SPS database method container
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Creating SPS db...
#> [SPS-DANGER] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Db created at '/home/dcassol/danielac@ucr.edu/testing/systemPipeShiny/docs/reference/SPS_20200810/config/sps.db'. DO NOT share this file with others
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Key md5 64c6af026e7f9d9bd77b2af6aafe5edb
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 SPS project setup done!
newTabData(
    tab_id = "data_new_remove",
    tab_displayname = "my first data tab",
    prepro_methods = list(makePrepro(label = "do nothing",
                                     plot_options = "plot_new")),
    app_path = glue("SPS_{format(Sys.time(), '%Y%m%d')}")
)
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:29 Write to file SPS_20200810/R/tab_vs_data_new_remove.R
#> Styling  1  files:
#>  SPS_20200810/R/tab_vs_data_new_remove.R ℹ 
#> ────────────────────────────────────────
#> Status	Count	Legend 
#> ✓ 	0	File unchanged.
#> ℹ 	1	File changed.
#> x 	0	Styling threw an error.
#> ────────────────────────────────────────
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:32 Now register your new tab to config/tab.csv
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:32 New tab created!
removeSpsTab("data_new_remove", force = TRUE,
             app_path = glue("SPS_{format(Sys.time(), '%Y%m%d')}"))
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:32 Matched tab(s): data_new_remove
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:32 1 tabs removed from tabs.csv
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:32 Now remove file SPS_20200810/R/tab_vs_data_new_remove.R
#> [SPS-INFO] 2020-08-10 09:35:32 Job complete
